mapper.insert: insert into tb_user (id , name, phone, pwd, role_id, role, create_time, update_time, del) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{pwd}, #{roleId}, #{role}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{del})
mapper.delete: update tb_user set del=1, update_time=#{updateTime} where id=#{id} limit 1;
mapper.select: select * from tb_user where id=#{id} and del=0
select count(*) from tb_user where del=0
/*naem 和 phone 都建有索引*/ select count(*) from tb_user where (name like CONCAT(#{search, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or phone like CONCAT(#{search, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')) and del=0
select * from tb_user where (name like CONCAT(#{search, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or phone like CONCAT(#{search, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')) and del=0 order by id desc limit #{start}, #{limit}
